text: Benjamin List (born 11 January 1968), also known as Ben List, is a German chemist. He is the director of the Max Planck Institute for Coal Research and professor of organic chemistry at the University of Cologne. He helped create organocatalysis. He shared the 2021 Nobel Prize in Chemistry with David MacMillan. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:German chemists Category:German academics Category:Writers from Frankfurt
title: Benjamin List
